entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to near valley bottom this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
